cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konya

sentence.kanji: 今夜は月がとてもきれいです。
sentence.romaji: konya ha tsuki ga totemo kirei desu
sentence.english: The moon is very beautiful tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kondo

sentence.kanji: 今度はどこに行きたいですか。
sentence.romaji: kondo ha doko ni ikitai desu ka
sentence.english: Where do you want to go this time?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasai

sentence.kanji: 私は毎日たくさん野菜を食べます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mainichi takusan yasai wo tabemasu
sentence.english: I eat a lot of vegetables every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakaku

sentence.kanji: ガソリンの価格がどんどん上がっている。
sentence.romaji: gasorin no kakaku ga dondon agate iru
sentence.english: The price of gasoline keeps going up fast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minami

sentence.kanji: 私の家は町の南にあります。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha machi no minami ni arimasu
sentence.english: My house is in the south of the town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitsuyou

sentence.kanji: 私にはたくさんのお金が必要だ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni ha takusan no okane ga hitsuyou da
sentence.english: I need a lot of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yotei

sentence.kanji: 今日の予定を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: kyou no yotei wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me what your schedule is for today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoshuu

sentence.kanji: 明日の予習をしましょう。
sentence.romaji: ashita no yoshuu wo shimashou
sentence.english: Let's prepare for tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoyaku

sentence.kanji: レストランを予約しました。
sentence.romaji: resutoran wo yoyaku shimashita
sentence.english: I made a reservation at the restaurant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youkyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は私の要求にこたえた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi no youkyuu ni kotaeta
sentence.english: He answered my demands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinen

sentence.kanji: 彼は今、禁煙しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ima kinen shite imasu
sentence.english: He's stopped smoking now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kongo

sentence.kanji: 今後ともよろしくお願いします。
sentence.romaji: kongo tomo yoroshiku onegai shimasu
sentence.english: I look forward to working with you in the future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kesa

sentence.kanji: 今朝から頭が痛い。
sentence.romaji: kesa kara atama ga itai
sentence.english: I've had a headache since this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyouka

sentence.kanji: 最近、彼の評価が上がった。
sentence.romaji: saikin kare no hyouka ga agata
sentence.english: He's been receiving more recognition lately.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nishi

sentence.kanji: 太陽は西に沈みます。
sentence.romaji: taiyou ha nishi ni shizumimasu
sentence.english: The sun sets in the west.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakyuu

sentence.kanji: 友達と野球をしました。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi to yakyuu wo shimashita
sentence.english: I played baseball with a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinenbi

sentence.kanji: 今日は両親の結婚記念日です。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ryoushin no kekon kinenbi desu
sentence.english: Today's my parents' wedding anniversary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zannen

sentence.kanji: その試合は残念な結果になった。
sentence.romaji: sono shiai ha zannen na keka ni nata
sentence.english: The result of the game was disappointing.

cards.english: receive on deposit, take charge of
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's azukaru

sentence.kanji: 荷物を預かってください。
sentence.romaji: nimotsu wo azukate kudasai
sentence.english: Please take care of the luggage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunya

sentence.kanji: 音楽は彼の得意な分野です。
sentence.romaji: ongaku ha kare no tokui na bunya desu
sentence.english: Music is his field of specialty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konkai

sentence.kanji: まあ今回は許してあげよう。
sentence.romaji: maa konkai ha yurushite ageyou
sentence.english: Well, I'll let you off this time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iya

sentence.kanji: 私は待つのが嫌だ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha matsu no ga iya da
sentence.english: I hate waiting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daikirai

sentence.kanji: 私はテストが大嫌い。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tesuto ga daikirai
sentence.english: I hate tests.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's azukeru

sentence.kanji: 鍵を彼に預けた。
sentence.romaji: kagi wo kare ni azuketa
sentence.english: I gave him the key to look after.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seireki

sentence.kanji: 西暦1964年に東京でオリンピックがあった。
sentence.romaji: seireki senkyuuhyakurokujuuyonen ni toukyou de orinpiku ga ata
sentence.english: The Tokyo Olympics were held in 1964.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikage

sentence.kanji: 暑いので日陰で休みましょう。
sentence.romaji: atsui no de hikage de yasumimashou
sentence.english: It's hot so let's take a rest in the shade.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imani

sentence.kanji: あなたも今に分かるでしょう。
sentence.romaji: anata mo imani wakaru deshou
sentence.english: You will understand one day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imagoro

sentence.kanji: 今ごろそんなこと言わないで。
sentence.romaji: imagoro sonna koto iwanai de
sentence.english: Don't say such a thing now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touzai

sentence.kanji: 東西に大きな道路が通っています。
sentence.romaji: touzai ni ooki na douro ga toote imasu
sentence.english: There's a major road running from east to west.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanboku

sentence.kanji: 南北に山が広がっています。
sentence.romaji: nanboku ni yama ga hirogate imasu
sentence.english: The mountains stretch out to the north and south.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kachi

sentence.kanji: とても価値のある話を聞いたよ。
sentence.romaji: totemo kachi no aru hanashi wo kiita yo
sentence.english: I heard a very valuable story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buka

sentence.kanji: この国の物価はここ10年でだいぶ上がったね。
sentence.romaji: kono kuni no buka ha koko 10 nen de daibu agata ne
sentence.english: Prices in this country have gone up considerably these last ten years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youten

sentence.kanji: 話の要点だけ教えてください。
sentence.romaji: hanashi no youten dake oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me just the main points of the talk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teika

sentence.kanji: この本の定価は525円です。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no teika ha 525 en desu
sentence.english: The regular price of this book is 525 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yosan

sentence.kanji: 車の費用、予算オーバーだ。
sentence.romaji: kuruma no hiyou、 yosan o-ba- da
sentence.english: The car expenses are over budget.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yohou

sentence.kanji: 予報では明日は雨ですね。
sentence.romaji: yohou de ha ashita ha ame desu ne
sentence.english: It will rain tomorrow according to the forecast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imanimo

sentence.kanji: 今にも雨が降りそうですね。
sentence.romaji: imanimo ame ga furisou desu ne
sentence.english: It looks like it's going to rain any moment now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nantou

sentence.kanji: 南東の方角に月が見えるよ。
sentence.romaji: nantou no hougaku ni tsuki ga mieru yo
sentence.english: You can see the moon in the southeast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yogen

sentence.kanji: 彼の予言は当たったことがないね。
sentence.romaji: kare no yogen ha atata koto ga nai ne
sentence.english: His predictions have never been correct.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuyou

sentence.kanji: IT産業はインドの主要産業よね。
sentence.romaji: aitei- sangyou ha indo no shuyou sangyou yo ne
sentence.english: IT is a major industry in India.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiya

sentence.kanji: 広い平野が一面雪で真っ白でした。
sentence.romaji: hiroi heiya ga ichimen yuki de mashiro deshita
sentence.english: The vast plains were pure-white with the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yousuruni

sentence.kanji: 要するに時機を待つべきだ。
sentence.romaji: yousuruni jiki wo matsubeki da
sentence.english: In short, we should wait for the right opportunity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yousuru

sentence.kanji: このビルは完成までに2年を要した。
sentence.romaji: kono biru ha kansei made ni 2 nen wo youshita
sentence.english: The building needed two years to be completed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nohara

sentence.kanji: 私たちは野原で花をつんだの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha nohara de hana wo tsunda no
sentence.english: We picked flowers in the field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youin

sentence.kanji: 私たちはがんの要因を研究しています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha gan no youin wo kenkyuu shite imasu
sentence.english: We're researching the contributing factors of cancer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touhyou

sentence.kanji: 私は朝早く投票を済ませました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha asa hayaku touhyou wo sumasemashita
sentence.english: I finished voting early in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mokuhyou

sentence.kanji: 私は父を目標にしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha chichi wo mokuhyou ni shite imasu
sentence.english: I take my father as a role model.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyoujun

sentence.kanji: ニュースでは標準語が使われるの。
sentence.romaji: nyu-su de ha hyoujungo ga tsukawareru no
sentence.english: Standard language is used in news broadcasts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chika

sentence.kanji: 東京の地価は上がり続けているんだ。
sentence.romaji: toukyou no chika ha agaritsuzukete iru n da
sentence.english: The price of land in Tokyo keeps going up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hokusei

sentence.kanji: 台風は北西に進んでいます。
sentence.romaji: taifuu ha hokusei ni susunde imasu
sentence.english: The typhoon is advancing toward the northwest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nansei

sentence.kanji: ここから南西に進むと村があります。
sentence.romaji: koko kara nansei ni susumu to mura ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a village if you continue southwest from here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yosou

sentence.kanji: 私の予想が当たった。
sentence.romaji: watashi no yosou ga atata
sentence.english: My forecast proved right.
